--- layout: datasheet title: Beacon Instrument ---

Integration of SensorFu Beacon into SensorFleet platform.

You may call it isolation, segregation, segmentation, partition or sandboxing. But do you know it works? Privacy, payment safety or your sanity may require it. Firewall rules, routing, VPNs, switch VLANs, cabling - it is just impossible to review everything works right everywhere! With Beacon, the testing is straightforward. For more information, visit SensorFu Beacon.

properties

Developer SensorFu Oy
Categories Isolation testing, Integrity monitoring
Network access type Active
Required interfaces
  • Interface for SensorFu Beacon to use
Dependencies None
Data retention Beacon Instrument does not store information
Management UI No
